title: small cursor
body: i had to do a factory reset on my computer the other day, and ever since then, my in game cursor has been about half the size it used to be, but my regular, out of client cursor is normal. this is kind of a problem because it is now super easy to lose track of it and have no clue where im clicking in a fight. what can i do about this?

replies.body:
Is there any chance that you're using a 4k or other high-end monitor? League _can_ run on these types of displays, but it isn't quite optimized for them yet. If this s the case, you may need to lower the resolution down to 1920x1080.

Let me know if that helps!
while im here, RITO! you should allow use to customize our cursors in game if we so desire! it would be a nice quality of life feature
